name: Intimidating Glance
text: Your gaze strikes fear into your enemies.
benefit: You can attempt to demoralize the target of your hypnotic stare as a swift action.
normal: Attempting to demoralize an opponent is a standard action.
text_zh: 只需一瞥，你就能在敌人心中植入恐惧。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 你能够以迅捷动作对你的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）目标尝试挫败士气（demoralize）。
normal_zh: 对一名敌人进行挫败士气的尝试要使用标准动作。
